alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 3:46AM PST until March 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Storm total snow total of 8 to 16 inches with local amounts to 20 inches, highest near the Kern County border. Southwest to west winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph shifting to west to northwest after midnight. Local to 60 mph possible at times. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible due to reduced visibility due to snow and blowing snow. Mountain roads, including Highway 33 and Lockwood Valley Road will likely be impacted at times. The weight of recent snow combined with strong winds may down trees and powerlines. The worst impacts are expected late Tuesday into Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
